title: Voidlings

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Attacked players will become a voidling the following night
-Players are informed they are attacked, and the only way to prevent the transformation is a doctor
-They must select a target to attack, or you can choose for them (bypassing control immunity)
-The player will then die at the end of the night they attack someone
-If you die, any current voidling is cured immediately

desc:
Post 2668
_It is not recommended attempting to survive being in a void_
